attributes.action: give children a better chance, and increase the pressure on adults to care more for the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children at Montem Primary School (Islington, North London) are concerned that adults are not looking after the world that we will grow up to live in.

There is too much pollution, too much devestation of rainforests, and people need to act now or it will be too late.

Everybody has to make an effort. The big companies need to make their businesses more eco-friendly, and everybody else can recycle more, use less energy and think more about the future.

Please sign our petition and show your support.
